name: Chessu CHAIN
description:
Im sick of chess, youre sick of chess, so why play chess?

So basically thats the lore of this game. Thats all the lore you get

In this game, you fight against waves of well... chess pieces? Not sure how close they are to actual chess pieces but they look like chess pieces. The pieces in the game's moveset are based on the actual pieces.... I hope

Oh right and how does this fit the theme? Well its a bit of a stretch but in this game the main thing is that you're "chaining" together combos... and thats like connecting together combos..... yeah idk either feel free to rate me low there.

This is one of the games Ive ever made

Credits

Yollie - game

Blue Lava - music

FreeSound.org - sfx
